title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: ColombiAPI package provides seamless interface access diverse public data Colombia API-Colombia, RESTful API. package enables users explore various aspects Colombia, including general information, geography, cultural insights. includes five API-related functions retrieve data topics Colombia’s general information, airports, departments, regions, presidents. Additionally, ColombiAPI offers built-function view datasets available within package. package also includes curated datasets covering Bogota air stations, business holiday dates, public schools, Colombian coffee exports, cannabis licenses, Medellin rainfall, malls Bogota, making comprehensive tool exploring Colombia’s data.

title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: ColombiAPI package provides five primary functions retrieve data API-Colombia, ’ll show two work section: get_Colombia_info() Retrieves general information Colombia, including capital, surface area, population, languages. get_regions_list() Retrieves information Colombia’s regions, showcasing unique characteristics. get_departments_list(): Lists departments Colombia, including geographical information. get_presidents_list(): Provides list presidents Colombia’s history. get_airports_list(): Get List Airports Colombia.
code: get_Colombia_info() #>       name surface population timeZone       currency currencySymbol   region #> 1 Colombia 1141748   52235050    UTC-5 Colombian Peso              $ Americas get_regions_list() #>   id      name #> 1  4  Amazonía #> 2  5    Andina #> 3  1    Caribe #> 4  6   Insular #> 5  3 Orinoquía #> 6  2  Pacífico

title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: addition API functions, ColombiAPI includes several preloaded datasets provide valuable insights various aspects Colombia: Bogota_airstations_df: data frame containing coordinates air quality monitoring stations Bogota. Bogota_business_Date: Date object listing official business dates Bogota. Bogota_holidays_Date: Date object listing official holidays Bogota. Bogota_malls_tbl_df: tibble detailed information malls Bogota. Cannabis_Licenses_tbl_df: tibble containing data cannabis licenses issued Colombia. Colombia_coffee_tbl_df: tibble details Colombian coffee export import year 2016. Medellin_rain_tbl_df: tibble providing rainfall data Medellin. Tulua_Public_Schools_tbl_df: tibble information public schools Tulua.

title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: dataset ColombiAPI labeled suffix indicate type structure: _df: standard data frame. _tbl_df: tibble, modern version data frame better formatting functionality. _Date: object type Date.

title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: ColombiAPI package includes built-function, view_datasets(), allows users view comprehensive list datasets available package directly console:
code: view_datasets() #> Datasets available in the ColombiAPI package: #> [1] "Bogota_airstations_df"       "Bogota_business_Date"        #> [3] "Bogota_holidays_Date"        "Bogota_malls_tbl_df"         #> [5] "Cannabis_Licenses_tbl_df"    "Colombia_coffee_tbl_df"      #> [7] "Medellin_rain_tbl_df"        "Tulua_Public_Schools_tbl_df"

title: ColombiAPI: Exploring Colombia's Public Data with API-Colombia
text: ColombiAPI package offers powerful set tools accessing analyzing public data Colombia. exploring general information country diving specific datasets topics like air quality, public schools, coffee exports, ColombiAPI enables users engage Colombia’s rich data landscape easily. detailed examples use cases, refer full package documentation explore datasets using built-functions.

text: Renzo Caceres Rossi. Author, maintainer.

title: Access Colombia's Public Data via API-Colombia
code: # Load the package library(ColombiAPI)  # List colombian presidents get_presidents_list()  # Shows Colombia's general information  get_Colombia_info()  # Load a dataset data("Bogota_airstations_df")  # View the dataset head(Bogota_airstations_df)  # Load another dataset data("Tulua_Public_Schools_tbl_df")  # Display the structure of the tibble str(Tulua_Public_Schools_tbl_df)

title: Bogota Air Stations Coordinates — Bogota_airstations_df
text: dataset, Bogota_airstations_df, data frame containing coordinates air quality measurement stations Bogota, Colombia.

title: Bogota Air Stations Coordinates — Bogota_airstations_df
text: data frame 10 observations 3 variables: ESTACION Character string representing name station. X Numeric value representing X coordinate station. Y Numeric value representing Y coordinate station.

text: Originally taken SpatFD package version 0.0.1. Data provided Secretaria de Ambiente de Bogotá: Monitor network air quality Bogota http://rmcab.ambientebogota.gov.co

title: Bogota Malls Information — Bogota_malls_tbl_df
text: dataset, Bogota_malls_tbl_df, tibble containing detailed information shopping malls located Bogota, Colombia. includes mall names, physical addresses, web URLs, geographical coordinates, locality mall belongs.

title: Bogota Malls Information — Bogota_malls_tbl_df
text: tibble 42 observations 6 variables: NAME Character string representing name shopping mall. ADDRESS Character string representing physical address mall. URL Character string representing web URL mall. LATITUD Numeric value representing latitude mall. LONGITUD Numeric value representing longitude mall. LOCALIDAD Character string representing locality mall belongs .

title: Cannabis Licenses Information — Cannabis_Licenses_tbl_df
text: dataset, Cannabis_Licenses_tbl_df, tibble containing detailed information cannabis-related licenses issued Ministry Justice Law Colombia. includes data number received, denied, archived, modified, granted licenses cannabis cultivation, well licenses issued psychoactive non-psychoactive cannabis plants.

title: Cannabis Licenses Information — Cannabis_Licenses_tbl_df
text: tibble 92 observations 10 variables: Mes Character string representing month data recorded. Solicitudes de licencias recibidas Numeric value representing number license requests received. Solicitudes Negadas Numeric value representing number denied license requests. Solicitudes Archivadas Numeric value representing number archived license requests. Solicitudes Modificadas Numeric value representing number modified license requests. Licencias Otorgadas Numeric value representing number licenses granted. Licencias expedidas de semillas para siembra Numeric value representing number seed cultivation licenses issued. Licencias expedidas de plantas cannabis psicoactivo Numeric value representing number psychoactive cannabis plant cultivation licenses issued. Licencias expedidas de plantas cannabis psicoactivo Numeric value representing number non-psychoactive cannabis plant cultivation licenses issued. Año Numeric value representing year data recorded.

title: Colombian Coffee 2016 Export/Import — Colombia_coffee_tbl_df
text: dataset, Colombia_coffee_tbl_df, tibble containing detailed information Colombian coffee exports imports 2016. includes data various factors trade flow, commodity codes, trade value, weight kilograms, information countries involved trade. dataset sourced Kaggle provides comprehensive analysis foreign trade Colombian coffee.

title: Colombian Coffee 2016 Export/Import — Colombia_coffee_tbl_df
text: tibble 106 observations 35 variables: Classification Character string representing classification coffee product. Year Numeric value representing year data entry. Period Numeric value representing period trade. Period Desc. Numeric value representing period description. Aggregate Level Numeric value representing aggregate level trade data. Leaf Code Numeric value indicating whether trade involves leaf product. Trade Flow Code Numeric value representing trade flow code. Trade Flow Character string representing flow trade, either export import. Reporter Code Numeric value representing code reporting country. Reporter Character string representing reporting country. Reporter ISO Character string representing ISO code reporting country. Partner Code Numeric value representing code partner country. Partner Character string representing partner country. Partner ISO Character string representing ISO code partner country. 2nd Partner Code Logical value indicating second partner country involved trade. 2nd Partner Logical value indicating second partner country. 2nd Partner ISO Logical value indicating second partner country's ISO code. Customs Proc. Code Logical value representing customs procedure code. Customs Logical value indicating whether customs procedure information available. Mode Transport Code Logical value representing mode transport code. Mode Transport Logical value indicating mode transport used trade. Commodity Code Character string representing commodity code coffee. Commodity Character string representing commodity (coffee). Qty Unit Code Numeric value representing quantity unit code. Qty Unit Character string representing unit quantity trade. Qty Logical value representing quantity coffee trade. Alt Qty Unit Code Logical value representing alternative quantity unit code. Alt Qty Unit Numeric value representing alternative quantity unit trade. Alt Qty Logical value representing alternative quantity trade. Netweight (kg) Numeric value representing net weight coffee kilograms. Gross weight (kg) Logical value indicating gross weight coffee kilograms. Trade Value (US) Numeric value representing trade value US dollars. CIF Trade Value (US) Logical value representing CIF trade value US dollars. FOB Trade Value (US) Logical value representing FOB trade value US dollars. Flag Numeric value representing flag dataset entry.

title: Colombian Coffee 2016 Export/Import — Colombia_coffee_tbl_df
text: Originally taken Kaggle, url: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/carlosbeltranv/colombian-coffee-2016

text: dataset name kept Colombia_coffee_tbl_df avoid confusion datasets R ecosystem. naming convention helps distinguish dataset part ColombiAPI package assists users identifying specific characteristics. suffix 'tbl_df' indicates dataset tibble. original content modified way.

what: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
title: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
text: function retrieves list airports Colombia public API "https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/Airport" returns data frame containing selected information airport, ordered airport name alphabetical order.

title: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
text: data frame following columns: id: unique identifier airport. name: name airport. iataCode: IATA code airport (available). oaciCode: OACI code airport (available). type: type airport (e.g., commercial, private). longitude: geographical longitude airport. latitude: geographical latitude airport.

title: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
text: function sends GET request API, processes JSON response, converts structured data frame. data filtered formatted include relevant columns, ordered name column alphabetical order (Z). API returns status code 400, function issues warning message inform user error. unexpected API response explicitly handled may cause function fail.

title: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
text: Ensure active internet connection access API. API structure changes API becomes unavailable, function may need modifications. function relies following packages: httr, jsonlite, dplyr, magrittr. %>% operator, used chaining commands, provided magrittr package.

title: Get the List of Airports in Colombia — get_airports_list
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Retrieve the list of airports airports <- get_airports_list()  # Print the data frame print(airports)  # View the data in a spreadsheet-like interface View(airports)  # Select airports located in a specific city (e.g., Bogotá) bogota_airports <- airports %>%   filter(grepl("Bogotá", name)) print(bogota_airports) } # }

title: Get Information About Colombia — get_Colombia_info
text: function makes API call https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/Country/Colombia retrieve information Colombia, name, surface area, population, time zone, currency, region. processes API response returns data structured data.frame.

title: Get Information About Colombia — get_Colombia_info
text: `data.frame` following columns: name: Name country. surface: surface area country square kilometers. population: population country. timeZone: time zone country. currency: currency used country. currencySymbol: currency symbol. region: region country world.

title: Get Information About Colombia — get_Colombia_info
text: function sends GET request API   https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/Country/Colombia. API returns   successful response (status code 200), data parsed returned.   response unsuccessful structure expected,   function return NULL.

title: Get Information About Colombia — get_Colombia_info
text: Ensure active internet connection access API. API structure changes API becomes unavailable, function may need modifications. function relies following packages: httr jsonlite. packages used making HTTP requests processing JSON responses, respectively.

title: Get Information About Colombia — get_Colombia_info
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{   # Call the function to get Colombia information   colombia_info <- get_Colombia_info()    # Print the result   print(colombia_info) } # }

what: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
title: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
text: function retrieves list departments Colombia public API "https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/Department" returns data frame containing selected information department, ordered department name alphabetical order.

title: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
text: data frame following columns: id: unique identifier department. name: name department. surface: surface area department square kilometers. population: population department.

title: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
text: function sends GET request API, processes JSON response, converts structured data frame. data filtered formatted include relevant columns (id, name, surface, population), ordered name column alphabetical order (Z). API returns status code 200, function issues message status code received returns NULL.

title: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
text: Ensure active internet connection access API. API structure changes API becomes unavailable, function may need modifications. function relies following packages: httr, jsonlite, dplyr, magrittr. %>% operator, used chaining commands, provided magrittr package.

title: Get the List of Departments in Colombia — get_departments_list
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Retrieve the list of departments departments <- get_departments_list()  # Print the data frame print(departments)  # View the data in a spreadsheet-like interface View(departments)  # Select departments with a specific population range large_departments <- departments %>%   filter(population > 1000000) print(large_departments) } # }

what: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
title: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
text: function retrieves list presidents Colombia public API "https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/President" returns data frame containing selected information president, ordered start period date descending order (recent first).

title: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
text: data frame following columns: id: unique identifier president. name: first name president. lastName: last name president. startPeriodDate: start date presidential period (ISO 8601 format). endPeriodDate: end date presidential period (ISO 8601 format). politicalParty: political party president.

title: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
text: function sends GET request API, processes JSON response, converts structured data frame. data filtered formatted include relevant columns, ordered startPeriodDate column descending order. API returns status code 400, function issues warning message inform user error. unexpected API response explicitly handled may cause function fail.

title: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
text: Ensure active internet connection access API. API structure changes API becomes unavailable, function may need modifications. function relies following packages: httr, jsonlite, dplyr, magrittr. %>% operator, used chaining commands, provided magrittr package.

title: Get the List of Presidents of Colombia — get_presidents_list
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Retrieve the list of presidents presidents <- get_president_list()  # Print the data frame print(presidents)  # View the data in a spreadsheet-like interface View(presidents)  # Select presidents from a specific political party library(dplyr) liberal_presidents <- presidents %>%   filter(politicalParty == "Liberal") print(liberal_presidents) } # }

text: function retrieves list regions Colombia public API "https://api-colombia.com/api/v1/Region" returns data frame containing selected information region, ordered region name alphabetical order.

title: Get the List of Regions in Colombia — get_regions_list
Get the List of Regions in Colombia — get_regions_list
text: data frame following columns: id: unique identifier region. name: name region.

title: Get the List of Regions in Colombia — get_regions_list
text: function sends GET request API, processes JSON response, converts structured data frame. data filtered formatted include relevant columns (id name), ordered name column alphabetical order (Z). API returns status code 200, function issues message status code received returns NULL.

title: Get the List of Regions in Colombia — get_regions_list
text: Ensure active internet connection access API. API structure changes API becomes unavailable, function may need modifications. function relies following packages: httr, jsonlite, dplyr, magrittr. %>% operator, used chaining commands, provided magrittr package.

title: Get the List of Regions in Colombia — get_regions_list
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Retrieve the list of regions regions <- get_regions_list()  # Print the data frame print(regions)  # View the data in a spreadsheet-like interface View(regions)  # Select regions with specific characteristics (e.g., starting with "Atlántico") atlantic_regions <- regions %>%   filter(grepl("^Atlántico", name)) print(atlantic_regions) } # }
